name: quick-feet
caption: Quick Feet

effect.short: Increases [Speed]{mechanic:speed} to 1.5× with a [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment}.
effect.full:
Whenever this Pokémon has a [major status ailment]{mechanic:major-status-ailment}, it has 1.5× its [Speed]{mechanic:speed}.  This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from [paralysis]{mechanic:paralysis}.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.

flavorText:
Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a
status condition.
